document_data.name: Spider Hound
document_data.mainbody: '''Spider hounds''' were predatory creatures found in the [[wild magic|wild-magic zones]] of the [[Helmlands]].
document_data.Description: A spider hound appeared as a yellow three-headed [[dog]] with eight [[spider]]-like legs.
document_data.Ecology: Spider hounds preyed on the [[white-skinned creature]]s that shared their habitat.
document_data.History:
Spider hounds started appearing in northeastern [[Cormyr]] during the [[Time of Troubles]].

In [[Kythorn]] of the {{yearlinkName|1358}}, a large pack of more than twenty spider hounds attacked [[Adon]], [[Caitlan Moonsong]], [[Cyric]], [[Kelemvor Lyonsbane]] and [[Midnight]] as they were traveling through a wild-magic zone en route from [[Arabel]] to [[Castle Kilgrave]]. The spider hounds ended up being driven off by Adon, who had given his [[horse]] a ''[[potion of speed]]'' and stormed the pack wielding his [[warhammer]] to great effect.
